quotes.text: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: You are not your thoughts. You are the awareness behind your thoughts.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Breathe in peace, breathe out stress.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.text: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy, and serenity.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.text: Progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Your mental health is a priority. Your happiness is essential. Your self-care is a necessity.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You don't have to be positive all the time. It's perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared, or anxious. Having feelings doesn't make you a negative person.
quotes.author: Lori Deschene

quotes.text: Take time to make your soul happy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

tips: Take three deep breaths before continuing your day.
Notice five things you can see around you right now.
Feel your feet on the ground - you are present.
Ask yourself: 'What do I really need right now?'
Take a moment to appreciate something beautiful nearby.
Stretch your arms above your head and breathe deeply.
Think of one thing you're grateful for today.
Notice the sensation of air entering and leaving your nose.
Give yourself permission to take a break.
Remember that you are exactly where you need to be.
Focus on what you can control, let go of what you cannot.
Your worth is not determined by your productivity.
It's okay to start over as many times as you need to.
Be kind to yourself - you're doing the best you can.
affirmations: I am in control of my thoughts and actions.
I am worthy of love and respect.
I trust in my ability to handle whatever comes my way.
I am growing and learning every day.
I am enough, exactly as I am.
I choose to focus on what I can control.
I give myself permission to rest.
I am grateful for this moment.
I choose mindfulness over mindless scrolling.
I am creating healthy habits for my future self.
I trust my journey and embrace the process.
I am worthy of taking care of myself.
